description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的政治人物与军事将领，曾任国务院副总理、总政治部主任等职。1955年被授予中国人民解放军中将军衔，是著名的“独臂将军”。
description.en: A Chinese Communist Party politician and military general, who served as Vice Premier of the State Council and Director of the PLA General Political Department. He was awarded the rank of lieutenant general in 1955 and is known as the 'one-armed general'.

description.zh-cn: 余秋里的妻子。
description.en: Spouse of Yu Qiuli.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国江西省的县，是余秋里的出生地。
description.en: A county in Jiangxi Province, China, and the birthplace of Yu Qiuli.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的首都，余秋里逝世的地点。
description.en: The capital of the People's Republic of China, and the place of Yu Qiuli's death.

description.zh-cn: 1929年吉安农民暴动后成立的武装组织，余秋里早年曾在此担任战士和分队长。
description.en: An armed organization established after the Ji'an peasant uprising in 1929, where Yu Qiuli served as a soldier and squad leader in his early years.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党领导的先进青年的群众组织。
description.en: A mass organization of advanced youth led by the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军时期为培养中高级军事政治干部而设立的学校，余秋里曾在此学习。
description.en: A school established during the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army period to train middle and senior military and political cadres, where Yu Qiuli once studied.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军主力部队之一，余秋里曾任该军团政治保卫队队长。
description.en: One of the main forces of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army, where Yu Qiuli served as the captain of its political security team.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军主力部队之一，余秋里曾任该军团第六师十八团政治委员。
description.en: One of the main forces of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army, where Yu Qiuli served as the political commissar of the 18th Regiment of the 6th Division.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军进行的战略大转移，余秋里随红二、六军团参与。
description.en: A major strategic retreat undertaken by the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army, in which Yu Qiuli participated with the Second and Sixth Army Corps.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国民革命军将领，其部队曾在长征途中与余秋里所在部队作战。
description.en: A general of the National Revolutionary Army of the Republic of China whose troops fought against Yu Qiuli's unit during the Long March.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军将领，曾任红二军团六师十八团团长。余秋里在战斗中为掩护他而左臂负重伤。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army, who served as the commander of the 18th Regiment of the 6th Division of the Second Red Army Corps. Yu Qiuli was severely wounded in his left arm while covering for him in battle.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在抗日战争时期创办的培养军事和政治干部的学校，余秋里曾在此学习。
description.en: A school founded by the Communist Party of China during the Second Sino-Japanese War to train military and political cadres, where Yu Qiuli once studied.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军总政治部

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军总政治部
en: General Political Department of the People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 曾是中国人民解放军负责政治思想、组织和纪律工作的最高领导机关，余秋里曾担任其主任。
description.en: Formerly the highest leading organ of the People's Liberation Army responsible for political ideology, organization, and disciplinary work, where Yu Qiuli once served as its director.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争时期中国共产党领导的主要抗日武装之一，余秋里在此担任过多个政治职务。
description.en: One of the main anti-Japanese armed forces led by the Communist Party of China during the Second Sino-Japanese War, where Yu Qiuli held several political positions.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，抗日战争时期曾与余秋里搭档，分别担任120师第3支队支队长和政治委员。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army who partnered with Yu Qiuli during the Second Sino-Japanese War as commander and political commissar of the 3rd Detachment of the 120th Division, respectively.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争时期八路军发动的一次大规模对日作战，余秋里参与了此次战役。
description.en: A large-scale offensive launched by the Eighth Route Army against Japanese forces during the Second Sino-Japanese War, in which Yu Qiuli participated.

description.zh-cn: 解放战争时期中国人民解放军进行的一次思想和政治教育运动，由余秋里在358旅开展的“诉苦三查”运动发展而来。
description.en: An ideological and political education movement carried out by the People's Liberation Army during the Chinese Civil War, which evolved from the 'Speak Bitterness and Three Checks' campaign initiated by Yu Qiuli in the 358th Brigade.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军在解放战争时期的主力部队之一，余秋里曾在此任职。
description.en: One of the main forces of the People's Liberation Army during the Chinese Civil War, where Yu Qiuli held a position.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军第1集团军

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军第1集团军
en: 1st Group Army of the People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 原隶属于第一野战军的部队，余秋里曾担任该军的师政治委员和军副政治委员。
description.en: A unit formerly under the First Field Army, where Yu Qiuli served as a division political commissar and deputy political commissar of the corps.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军总后方勤务部

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军总后方勤务部

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军总后勤部的前身之一，负责军队后勤保障工作，余秋里曾任政治委员。
description.en: A predecessor of the PLA General Logistics Department, responsible for military logistics support, where Yu Qiuli served as Political Commissar.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国石油工业部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国石油工业部
en: Ministry of Petroleum Industry of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国曾经设立的负责石油工业的政府部门，余秋里是其主要领导人之一，领导了大庆油田的开发。
description.en: A former government department of the People's Republic of China responsible for the petroleum industry. Yu Qiuli was one of its main leaders and directed the development of the Daqing Oil Field.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国东北的大型油田，其发现和开发对中国工业发展具有里程碑意义，余秋里是其早期开发的主要指挥者。
description.en: A large oil field in northeastern China, whose discovery and development were milestones for China's industrial development. Yu Qiuli was the main commander of its early development.

description.zh-cn: 大庆油田著名石油工人，被誉为“铁人”。余秋里发起了学习王进喜的活动。
description.en: A famous oil worker at the Daqing Oil Field, known as the 'Iron Man'. Yu Qiuli initiated a campaign to learn from Wang Jinxi.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国家计划委员会

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家计划委员会
en: State Planning Commission of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院曾存在的宏观经济管理部门，余秋里曾长期在此担任主任等领导职务。
description.en: A former macroeconomic management department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, where Yu Qiuli held leadership positions such as director for a long time.

description.zh-cn: 1966年至1976年在中国发生的一场重大政治运动，余秋里在此期间受到冲击。
description.en: A major political movement in China from 1966 to 1976, during which Yu Qiuli was impacted.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党、中国人民解放军和中华人民共和国的主要缔造者和领导人。曾在文化大革命期间出面保护余秋里。
description.en: The main founder and leader of the Communist Party of China, the People's Liberation Army, and the People's Republic of China. He intervened to protect Yu Qiuli during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党高级领导人，中央文革小组组长。曾在新闻稿中试图省略余秋里的名字，但被毛泽东阻止。
description.en: A senior leader of the Communist Party of China and head of the Central Cultural Revolution Group. He attempted to omit Yu Qiuli's name from a press release but was stopped by Mao Zedong.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院副总理

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院副总理
en: Vice Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院的领导职位，余秋里曾担任此职。
description.en: A leading position in the State Council of the People's Republic of China, once held by Yu Qiuli.

en: Politburo of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央领导机构，余秋里曾是其委员。
description.en: The central leading body of the Communist Party of China, of which Yu Qiuli was a member.

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家能源委员会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国曾设立的负责国家能源事务的机构，余秋里曾任主任。
description.en: A former agency of the People's Republic of China responsible for national energy affairs, where Yu Qiuli served as director.

en: Secretariat of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局和其常务委员会的办事机构，余秋里曾任书记。
description.en: The administrative body of the Politburo and its Standing Committee of the Communist Party of China, where Yu Qiuli served as a secretary.

en: Central Military Commission of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党最高军事领导机构，余秋里曾任副秘书长。
description.en: The highest military leading body of the Communist Party of China, where Yu Qiuli served as Deputy Secretary-General.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国中央军事委员会

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国中央军事委员会
en: Central Military Commission of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高国家军事领导机构，余秋里曾是其委员。
description.en: The highest state military leading body of the People's Republic of China, of which Yu Qiuli was a member.

description.zh-cn: 1982年至1992年存在的中共中央组织，作为废除干部领导职务终身制的过渡性机构，余秋里曾任常务委员。
description.en: An organ of the CPC Central Committee that existed from 1982 to 1992 as a transitional body for abolishing the lifelong tenure of leading cadres, where Yu Qiuli served as a standing committee member.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，余秋里在中国人民解放军总政治部主任职位上的前任。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army and Yu Qiuli's predecessor as Director of the PLA General Political Department.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，余秋里在中国人民解放军总政治部主任职位上的继任者。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army and Yu Qiuli's successor as Director of the PLA General Political Department.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军大将，余秋里在中国人民解放军总后方勤务部政治委员职位上的前任。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army and Yu Qiuli's predecessor as Political Commissar of the PLA General Rear Services Department.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任石油工业部部长，并在总后方勤务部政委职位上接替余秋里。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army who served as Minister of Petroleum Industry and succeeded Yu Qiuli as Political Commissar of the General Rear Services Department.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的高级领导人，余秋里在国家计划委员会主任职位上的继任者。
description.en: A senior leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, and Yu Qiuli's successor as Director of the State Planning Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的领导人之一，余秋里在国家计划委员会主任职位上的前任。
description.en: One of the leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, and Yu Qiuli's predecessor as Director of the State Planning Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军中将，在余秋里卸任后以军管会主任身份接管石油工业部。
description.en: A lieutenant general of the People's Liberation Army who took over the Ministry of Petroleum Industry as the director of the military control committee after Yu Qiuli left office.

description.zh-cn: 曾在红军大学第四分校学习。
description.en: Studied at the Fourth Branch of the Red Army University.

position.en: Captain of the Political Security Team

position.zh-cn: 第六师十八团政治委员
position.en: Political Commissar of the 18th Regiment, 6th Division

description.zh-cn: 1936年2月，余秋里所在部队在乌蒙山区与万耀煌指挥的国民党军队作战。
description.en: In February 1936, Yu Qiuli's unit fought against KMT troops commanded by Wan Yaohuang in the Wumeng Mountains.

description.zh-cn: 在与万耀煌部队作战时，余秋里为掩护时任团长的成钧而导致左臂重伤，最终截肢。
description.en: During a battle with Wan Yaohuang's troops, Yu Qiuli's left arm was severely injured while covering for then-regiment commander Cheng Jun, leading to its amputation.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军总政治部

zh-cn: 中央军委总政治部直属政治处副主任
en: Deputy Director of the Political Division directly under the CMC General Political Department

position.zh-cn: 总政治部组织部组织科科长兼巡视团主任、120师干部大队政治委员、120师第3支队政治委员、第358旅第8团政治委员及团长、第358旅政治部主任、第358旅政治委员
position.en: Section Chief of Organization Section & Director of Inspection Group of the Organization Department of the General Political Department, Political Commissar of the Cadre Brigade of the 120th Division, Political Commissar of the 3rd Detachment of the 120th Division, Political Commissar and Commander of the 8th Regiment of the 358th Brigade, Director of the Political Department of the 358th Brigade, Political Commissar of the 358th Brigade

description.zh-cn: 余秋里担任120师第3支队政治委员时，与时任支队长的贺炳炎搭档合作，率队开辟根据地。
description.en: When Yu Qiuli was the political commissar of the 3rd Detachment of the 120th Division, he partnered with commander He Bingyan to lead the troops in establishing a base area.

description.zh-cn: 余秋里参与了百团大战。
description.en: Yu Qiuli participated in the Hundred Regiments Offensive.

description.zh-cn: 余秋里在358旅开展的“诉苦三查”运动，是全军新式整军运动的开端。
description.en: The 'Speak Bitterness and Three Checks' campaign initiated by Yu Qiuli in the 358th Brigade was the beginning of the new-style army consolidation movement throughout the army.

position.en: Political Commissar of the 1st Division, 1st Corps

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军总后方勤务部
中华人民共和国石油工业部

position.zh-cn: 大庆石油会战指挥部工委书记
position.en: Secretary of the Party Working Committee of the Daqing Oil Field Campaign Headquarters

description.zh-cn: 作为石油工业部部长，余秋里直接领导和指挥了大庆油田的勘探与开发会战。
description.en: As Minister of Petroleum Industry, Yu Qiuli directly led and commanded the exploration and development campaign of the Daqing Oil Field.

description.zh-cn: 余秋里在大庆油田发起了学习“铁人”王进喜的活动，将其树立为全国的榜样。
description.en: Yu Qiuli initiated a campaign at the Daqing Oil Field to learn from 'Iron Man' Wang Jinxi, establishing him as a national role model.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国家计划委员会

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命期间，余秋里受到冲击和批斗，但由于毛泽东的保护未被解除职务。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Yu Qiuli was attacked and struggled against, but was not removed from his posts due to Mao Zedong's protection.

description.zh-cn: 1968年，当陈伯达试图在新闻稿中省略余秋里的名字时，毛泽东亲自过问并指示加上，从而在政治上保护了余秋里。
description.en: In 1968, when Chen Boda attempted to omit Yu Qiuli's name from a press release, Mao Zedong personally intervened and ordered it to be included, thus politically protecting Yu Qiuli.

description.zh-cn: 1968年，陈伯达在组织关于毛泽东接见领导人的新闻稿时，试图将余秋里的名字省略。
description.en: In 1968, while organizing a press release about Mao Zedong's meeting with leaders, Chen Boda attempted to omit Yu Qiuli's name.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院副总理
中华人民共和国中央军事委员会

description.zh-cn: 余秋里接替韦国清担任中国人民解放军总政治部主任。
description.en: Yu Qiuli succeeded Wei Guoqing as Director of the PLA General Political Department.

description.zh-cn: 杨白冰接替余秋里担任中国人民解放军总政治部主任。
description.en: Yang Baibing succeeded Yu Qiuli as Director of the PLA General Political Department.

description.zh-cn: 余秋里接替黄克诚担任中国人民解放军总后方勤务部政治委员。
description.en: Yu Qiuli succeeded Huang Kecheng as Political Commissar of the PLA General Rear Services Department.

description.zh-cn: 李聚奎接替余秋里担任中国人民解放军总后方勤务部政治委员。
description.en: Li Jukui succeeded Yu Qiuli as Political Commissar of the PLA General Rear Services Department.

description.zh-cn: 姚依林接替余秋里担任中华人民共和国国家计划委员会主任。
description.en: Yao Yilin succeeded Yu Qiuli as Director of the State Planning Commission of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 余秋里接替李富春担任中华人民共和国国家计划委员会主任。
description.en: Yu Qiuli succeeded Li Fuchun as Director of the State Planning Commission of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 余秋里接替李聚奎担任中华人民共和国石油工业部部长。
description.en: Yu Qiuli succeeded Li Jukui as Minister of Petroleum Industry of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 欧阳毅作为军管会主任接管了余秋里卸任后的中华人民共和国石油工业部。
description.en: Ouyang Yi, as the director of the military control committee, took over the Ministry of Petroleum Industry after Yu Qiuli stepped down.
